1.4.name: wordpress/google-pagerank-display
1.4.description:
Google PageRank Display shows your site pagerank instantly and you can change style from General Options. more than 130+ pagerank buttons & badges. * Install files * Activate the plugin * Go General Options [options-general.php?page=gpdisplay] * Choose style you like * Update option

  • And add this code your theme // <?php show_gpdisplay() ?>

Features:

  • Real Google Pagerank : Shows real google pagerank, not fake
  • Many Style : There are 134 different pagerank button and badges
  • Automatic : just you change style from option
  • Fast : Loading pagerank fast, get image remotely.
  • Get your site page rank instantly

Details: http://www.getrank.org
